languages.text: {n}Жрец сверлит вас мрачным взглядом, его вокс-устройство напряженно потрескивает. Спустя несколько секунд, он коротко кивает.{/n} "Ответ принят. Будущее святилища Адептус Механикус остается под угрозой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Жрец сверлит вас мрачным взглядом, его вокс-устройство напряженно потрескивает. Спустя несколько секунд, он коротко кивает.{/n} "Ответ принят. Будущее святилища Адептус Механикус остается под угрозой".

languages.text: {n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze as his vox-caster tensely crackles. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."
languages.original_text: {n}Жрец сверлит вас мрачным взглядом, его вокс-устройство напряженно потрескивает. Спустя несколько секунд, он коротко кивает.{/n} "Ответ принят. Будущее святилища Адептус Механикус остается под угрозой".

traits.locale_text: {n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze. His vox-device crackles tensely. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."

{n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze. His vox-device crackles tensely. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."

{n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze as his vox-caster tensely crackles. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."

{n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze as his vox-caster tensely crackles. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."

languages.text: {n}Der Priester durchbohrt dich mit seinem düsteren Blick, während sein Vox-Transmitter angespannt knistert. Ein paar Sekunden später nickt er knapp.{/n} "Antwort akzeptiert. Die Zukunft des Sanctums des Adeptus Mechanicus ist weiterhin bedroht."
languages.original_text: {n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze as his vox-caster tensely crackles. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Priester durchbohrt dich mit seinem düsteren Blick, während sein Vox-Transmitter angespannt knistert. Ein paar Sekunden später nickt er knapp.{/n} "Antwort akzeptiert. Die Zukunft des Sanctums des Adeptus Mechanicus ist weiterhin bedroht."

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre vous transperce de son regard sombre tandis que son émetteur vox crépite nerveusement. Quelques secondes plus tard, il acquiesce brièvement :{/n} « Réponse acceptée. L'avenir du sanctum de l'Adeptus Mechanicus reste menacé. »
languages.original_text: {n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze as his vox-caster tensely crackles. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre vous transperce de son regard sombre tandis que son émetteur-vox crépite nerveusement. Quelques secondes plus tard, il acquiesce brièvement :{/n} « Réponse acceptée. L'avenir du sanctum de l'Adeptus Mechanicus reste menacé. »

languages.text: {n}这位技术神甫严厉的目光仿佛要把你刺穿，音阵装置发出紧张的噼啪声。几秒钟后，他简短地点了点头。{/n}“已接受回答。机械修会圣所的未来仍处于危险之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze as his vox-caster tensely crackles. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位技术祭司严厉的目光仿佛要把你刺穿，音阵装置发出紧张的噼啪声。几秒钟后，他简短地点了点头。{/n}“已接受回答。机械修会圣所的未来仍处于危险之中。”

languages.text: {n}司祭はキッと厳しい視線をこちらに向け、ヴォクスキャストが張り詰めた中、パチパチと音を立てる。数秒後、司祭は短く頷いた。{/n}「回答を受け入れた。帝国技術局のサンクトゥムの将来は依然として脅威にさらされている」
languages.original_text: {n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze as his vox-caster tensely crackles. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}司祭はキッと厳しい視線をこちらに向け、ヴォクスキャストが張り詰めた中、パチパチと音を立てる。数秒後、司祭は短く頷いた。{/n}「回答を受け入れた。帝国技術局のサンクトゥムの将来は依然として脅威にさらされている」

languages.text: {n}El sacerdote te atraviesa con su sombría mirada mientras su emisor voco emite un crujido intenso. Al cabo de unos segundos, asiente brevemente.{/n} «Respuesta aceptada. el futuro del sanctum del Adeptus Mechanicus sigue amenazado».
languages.original_text: {n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze as his vox-caster tensely crackles. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sacerdote te atraviesa con su sombría mirada mientras su emisor voco emite un crujido intenso. Al cabo de unos segundos, asiente brevemente.{/n} «Respuesta aceptada. el futuro del sanctum del Adeptus Mechanicus sigue amenazado».

languages.text: {n}Rahip'in voksyayarı gergin gergin çatırdarken uğursuz bakışları seni delip geçiyor. Birkaç kısa saniye sonunda başıyla kısaca onaylıyor.{/n} "Cevap kabul edildi. Adeptus Mechanicus kutağının istikbali tehdit altında kalmaya devam ediyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The priest pierces you with his grim gaze as his vox-caster tensely crackles. A few seconds later, he nods briefly.{/n} "Answer accepted. The future of the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum remains under threat."
